title: Tell Me Lies: Manlove Edition
description: ✔ Dark Romance✔ Enemies to Lovers✔ Bully Romance✔ GayThese four dark romance novellas pack the heat. Our bestselling authors showcase a variety of contemporary gay romances featuring bully and enemies-to-lovers themes. There may be triggers, so be warned that these aren't your average love stories.Red Light Rivals by Faedra RoseBroken by L.J. LongoSeducer by Lea BronsenRedeem My Heart by Megan Slayer
author: Faedra Rose
